titleStmt.title: The constant lover. VVho his affection will not move, though he live not where he love. To a northerne tune called, Shall the absence of my mistresse.
titleStmt.author: Lowberry, Peter.

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Verse: "You loyall lovers that are distant ..."
